holidays.name: Respect Your Cat Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to appreciating your feline friends and pampering them with extra love and treats.
holidays.origin: Originating from cat lovers aiming to boost feline appreciation, this day encourages bonding with cats worldwide.
holidays.funFact: Cats have been revered in different cultures for thousands of years, but only recently have we dedicated an entire day just to respect them!

holidays.name: Teacher’s Day (Czech Republic and Slovakia)
holidays.description: Honoring educators and their contribution, this day commemorates the birthday of John Amos Comenius, a famous educator.
holidays.origin: Celebrated in Czech Republic and Slovakia to honor Comenius, known as the father of modern education.
holidays.funFact: Comenius was among the first to propose lifelong education and universal schooling during the 17th century!

holidays.name: National Weed Appreciation Day (United States)
holidays.description: A quirky day to acknowledge the often pesky but ecologically helpful weeds in our gardens and yards.
holidays.origin: Started by gardening enthusiasts to highlight the environmental role of some weeds and encourage tolerance.
holidays.funFact: Some common weeds have medicinal properties and can contribute to biodiversity in urban environments.

holidays.name: Teacher’s Appreciation Day (Czech Republic)
holidays.description: A specific day to appreciate teachers beyond the general Teacher’s Day celebrations, focusing on individual educators' hard work.
holidays.origin: Tied closely to the birthday of John Amos Comenius, celebrated widely in schools across the Czech Republic.
holidays.funFact: Many schools hold special events and give small gifts to teachers on this day, making it a cherished occasion.
